prerequisite: Only a sentinel can take this paragon path.
name: Steadfast Sentinel
text: You have now unlocked many secrets of primal magic, and in battle you and your animal companion are a fierce pair. Your mastery of primal magic grows ever stronger as you progress through this new tier.

features.level11ImprovedCombinedAttack(11thLevel): You gain one more use of combined attack per encounter, but you can still use it only once per turn
features.sentinel'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you or one ally within 5 squares of you can shift up to his or her speed as a free action before or after you take the extra action
features.bountyOfSpring(12thLevel): You gain the bounty of spring power
features.aThousandFaces(16thLevel): You gain the power a thousand faces
features.verdantHarmony(20thLevel): You gain the verdant harmony power
